package.name: belarusian-letters
package.author: Yaraslau Shapaval
package.description: Type belarusian letters without layout switching
package.title: Belarusian Letters

manifest.author: Yaraslau Shapaval
manifest.description: Type belarusian letters without layout switching
manifest.name: belarusian-letters
manifest.title: Belarusian Letters

value.readme:
Type belarusian letters without layout switching

Usage:
| Type | Replace |
|----|---|
| У_ | Ў |
| у_ | ў |
| И_ | І |
| и_ | i |
| Г_ | Ґ |
| г_ | ґ |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Belarusian traditional cyrillic letters

matches:
  # Ŭ/ŭ https://be-tarask.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%8E
  - trigger: "У_"
    replace: "Ў"
  - trigger: "у_"
    replace: "ў"

  # I/i
  - trigger: "И_"
    replace: "І"
  - trigger: "и_"
    replace: "і"
  
  # G/g https://be-tarask.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D2%90
  - trigger: "Г_"
    replace: "Ґ"
  - trigger: "г_"
    replace: "ґ"
